snippet: The Freiburg Baroque Orchestra’s concert on Tuesday night at Alice Tully Hall featured a varied approach to ornamentation, as it did in its most recent release, a disc of Bach’s four orchestral suites.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by the Freiburg Baroque Orchestra at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Freiburg Baroque Orchestra’s concert on Tuesday night at Alice Tully Hall featured a varied approach to ornamentation, as it did in its most recent release, a disc of Bach’s four orchestral suites.
